attributes.additional_details: Please help 4 children who are being taken into the care system for allegations what is not true!! A nanny who loves her granchildren and son deeply who's done nothing but pretect them!!!
attributes.background: Help save 4 children from the care system!!!

rejection.details: We think you are asking for the Government to stop the courts from ordering that specific children be taken into care. This is not something the Government has the power to do, because the courts in the UK are independent of Government and Parliament. It is a decision for the court alone to make after it has considered the evidence.
